member.name: T:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.FolderSyncProgressionEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information on the progression of the synchronization of the folder - for event.

member.name: T:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information on the synchronization being performed.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncEventArgs.IsFirstSynchronization
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether this is the first synchronization with the current items.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncEventArgs.IsPartOfAFolderSynchronization
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether the current synchronization is part of a larger synchronization job where folders are being synchronized.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncEventArgs.Options
member.summary: Gets or set the that will be used for the current synchronization job.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncEventArgs.UserData
member.summary: Gets or sets the opaque data that will be sent back to the event handler whenever an event is raised.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.FolderSyncProgressionEventArgs.Abort
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the entire synchronization should be aborted.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.FolderSyncProgressionEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the impending synchronization of the current file should be canceled.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.FolderSyncProgressionEventArgs.CurrentFile
member.summary: Gets a object representing the file that is about to be synchronized as part of an ongoing folder synchronization.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.FolderSyncProgressionEventArgs.SearchCondition
member.summary: An array of objects. These filters will be applied to each item in the array before synchronization begins.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.FolderSyncProgressionEventArgs.IrrelevantItemIndexes
member.summary: An array of integers containing indexes of the array that specify items who should be considered irrelevant when trying to designate a master item.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.FolderSyncProgressionEventArgs.Items
member.summary: An array of containing the items to be synchronized.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.FolderSyncProgressionEventArgs.MasterItemIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the item to be used as the master during the synchronization process.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.FolderSyncProgressionEventArgs.MetaDataItem
member.summary: A object representing the location where meta data, if enabled, can be accessed.

member.name: T:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.GetSyncFileFromFolderEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information on the retrieval of a synchronization file from a folder - for event.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.GetSyncFileFromFolderEventArgs.Folder
member.summary: Gets the folder from which a file to be synchronized must be selected.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.GetSyncFileFromFolderEventArgs.Items
member.summary: Gets the objects representing the items to be processed.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.GetSyncFileFromFolderEventArgs.LastSynchronizationDate
member.summary: Gets the date and time of the last synchronization.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.GetSyncFileFromFolderEventArgs.MasterItem
member.summary: Gets the to be used as the master during the event of the synchronization process.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.GetSyncFileFromFolderEventArgs.MasterItemIndex
member.summary: Gets the to be used as the master during the event of the synchronization process.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.GetSyncFileFromFolderEventArgs.SynchronizationFile
member.summary: An object from the folder specified by the Folder property, representing the file that will be synchronized.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.GetSyncFileFromFolderEventArgs.SynchronizationSessionName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the synchronization session.

member.name: T:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAction
member.summary: A value representing the action to be taken during the synchronization process.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAction.CreateOrOverwriteWithMaster
member.summary: The file or folder will be created or overwritten with the master's data.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAction.Resume
member.summary: Resumes previously interrupted transfer of the file.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAction.Delete
member.summary: The file or folder will be deleted.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAction.None
member.summary: No action will be taken on this file or folder.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAction.OverwriteAttributesOnly
member.summary: The file's attributes will be overwritten with the master file's attributes.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAction.Process
member.summary: This file will be processed by the synchronization algorithm.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAction.SuspendedCreateOrOverwrite
member.summary: The file or folder was to be be created or overwritten with the master's data, but options and/or other factors have overriden the decision, so no action will be taken on this item.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAction.SuspendedDelete
member.summary: The file or folder was to be deleted, but options and/or other factors have overriden the decision, so no action will be taken on this item.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAction.SuspendedResume
member.summary: The file was to be resumed transfer, but options and/or other factors have overriden the decision, so no action will be taken on this file.

member.name: T:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAnalysisEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information on the analysis being performed for the synchronization.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAnalysisEventArgs.Actions
member.summary: Gets the actions to be performed on the files during the synchronization.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAnalysisEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the synchronization should be canceled.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAnalysisEventArgs.ConflictReasons
member.summary: Gets the reasons for any conflicts that arose during the conflict detection of the synchronization.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAnalysisEventArgs.Files
member.summary: Gets the files that are to be analyzed.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAnalysisEventArgs.HasConflicts
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether ConflictReasons contains one or more values that denote a conflict.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAnalysisEventArgs.LastSynchronizationDate
member.summary: Gets the date and time of the last synchronization.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAnalysisEventArgs.MasterFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the master file, in relation to Files.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAnalysisEventArgs.MasterFileIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the master file, in relation to Files.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAnalysisEventArgs.PerformsActions
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether contains one or more values that denote actions other than doing nothing or suspended action.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAnalysisEventArgs.PerformsActionsOrSuspendedActions
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether contains one or more values that denote actions other than .

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncAnalysisEventArgs.SynchronizationSessionName
member.summary: Gets the name of the synchronization session.

member.name: T:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncCompareFileDataEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information on the comparison of file data during the synchronization.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncCompareFileDataEventArgs.AllowComparison
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to allow the component to compare files.
member.value: true if the component will compare files; false otherwise.
member.remarks: Set this property to false, if all the values in will be considered the final results on equality against the master file. When set to true, all the files in will be compared to the master file.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncCompareFileDataEventArgs.Files
member.summary: Gets the files that are to be processed.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncCompareFileDataEventArgs.ComparisonResults
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of boolean values indicating whether the Files are equal or not to the master file.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncCompareFileDataEventArgs.FilesToCompare
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of boolean values indicating whether the Files are equal or not to the master file.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncCompareFileDataEventArgs.LastSynchronizationDate
member.summary: Gets the date and time when the last synchronization was performed.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncCompareFileDataEventArgs.MasterFile
member.summary: Gets the master file, in relation to .

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncCompareFileDataEventArgs.MasterFileIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the master file, in relation to Files.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncCompareFileDataEventArgs.SynchronizationSessionName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the synchronization session.

member.name: T:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information on conflicts that occur during the synchronization.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictEventArgs.Actions
member.summary: Gets the actions to be performed on the files during the synchronization.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the synchronization should be canceled.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictEventArgs.ChosenMasterFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the master file, in relation to , to be used to resolve the potential conflict among the files being synchronized.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictEventArgs.ChosenMasterFileIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the master file, in relation to Files, to be used to resolve the potential conflict between files to synchronize.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictEventArgs.ConflictReasons
member.summary: Gets the reasons for any conflicts that arise during the synchronization.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictEventArgs.Files
member.summary: Gets the files that are to be processed.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictEventArgs.HasConflicts
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating whether ConflictReasons contains one or more values that indicate a conflict.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictEventArgs.LastSynchronizationDate
member.summary: Gets the date and time of the last synchronization.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictEventArgs.OriginalMasterFile
member.summary: Gets the master file as determined by the synchronization algorithm.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictEventArgs.OriginalMasterFileIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the master file as determined by the synchronization algorithm. in relation to .

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictEventArgs.SynchronizationSessionName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the synchronization session.

member.name: T:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictReason
member.summary: A value representing one or more reasons for conflicts between files during a synchronization.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictReason.ModifiedAfterLastSynchronization
member.summary: The file was modified after the last synchronization.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictReason.MoreRecentThanMaster
member.summary: The file is more recent than the master file.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictReason.NoConflict
member.summary: No conflict has been detected.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictReason.SameDateAsMasterDifferentData
member.summary: The file's date is the same as the master file's date, but its data is different.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncConflictReason.Resumable
member.summary: The destination file's resumable.

member.summary: Gets the actions to be performed on the folders during the synchronization.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncFolderAnalysisEventArgs.Folders
member.summary: Gets the folders that have been analysed.

member.summary: Gets the master folder, in relation to .

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncFolderAnalysisEventArgs.MasterFolderIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the master folder, in relation to .

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncFolderAnalysisEventArgs.SynchronizationSessionName
member.summary: Gets the name of the synchronization session.

member.name: T:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncMetaDataEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information on the meta data during the synchronization.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncMetaDataEventArgs.AllowMetaDataFileDataAccess
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether or not the synchronization operation is allowed to access the metadata found in itself. The default value is true.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncMetaDataEventArgs.LastSynchronizationDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time of the last synchronization.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncMetaDataEventArgs.MetaDataFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the meta data file to be used for the synchronization session.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncMetaDataEventArgs.MetaDataItem
member.summary: Gets or sets the object representing a meta data item.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncMetaDataEventArgs.MetaDataXmlReader
member.summary: Gets or sets the meta data reader.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncMetaDataEventArgs.MetaDataXmlWriter
member.summary: Gets or sets the meta data writer.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncMetaDataEventArgs.SynchronizationSessionName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the synchronization session.

member.name: T:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.LoadingSyncMetaDataEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information on the loading of meta data during the synchronization.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.LoadingSyncMetaDataEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the synchronization should be canceled.

member.name: T:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions
member.summary: Represents the options used during the synchronization.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.AllowCreations
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether new files can be created during the synchronization process.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.AllowResuming
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether broken files due to a previous interrupted file transfer can be resumed during the synchronization process.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.AllowDeletions
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether deletions will be allowed during the synchronization.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.AutoConflictResolution
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether conflicts should be resolved automatically.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.BuildDirectoryTree
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to build directory structure before synchronizing folders. If true is used, event will report the total progress percentage correctly.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.Comparer
member.summary: Gets or sets the file comparer used to detect conflicts between files. For example: - compare file data, - compare file checksums, - compare last write time of files, etc.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.PerformRefresh
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the method should be called before using an item's dates and attribute in the synchronization.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.PreviewOnly
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether the synchronization will be performed in preview-mode only, that is, without making any changes to files.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.PerformSecondSyncOnUnnecessaryFolders
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to perform 2nd synchronization round for unnecessary folders. The default value is true.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.Recursive
F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.UseMetaData
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether meta data should be used during the synchronization.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.TimeResolution
member.summary: Gets or sets the granularity for time comparisons.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.Default
member.summary: Gets the default synchronization options.

member.name: M:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.#ctor(ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the values of the supplied SynchronizationOptions object.
member.param: The source options.

member.name: M:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.Clone
member.summary: Creates a copy of this object.

member.name: M:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.CopyTo(ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions)
member.summary: Copies the values of the current object to the supplied object.
member.param: The source options.

member.name: M:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions.Reset
member.summary: Resets the values of the current object to the values found in the Default object.

member.name: T:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult
member.summary: Defines synchronization results.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.AllFilesEqual
member.summary: All files have the same data and last write time.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.Canceled
member.summary: The synchronization was canceled.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.ConflictsDetected
member.summary: Conflicts between files were detected during the synchronization.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.FileSynchronization
member.summary: The synchronization involved files.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.FolderSynchronization
member.summary: The synchronization involved the contents of folders.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.IrrelevantItemNotFound
member.summary: A specified as an irrelevant item for determining the synchronization's master item could not be found among the items to synchronize.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.ItemsSynchronized
member.summary: One or more items (files or folders) were successfully synchronized.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.MasterItemNotFound
member.summary: A master manually specified as the master item in the synchronization could not be found among the items to synchronize.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.MetadataLoaded
member.summary: Metadata about previous synchronizations has been located and loaded for use in the current synchronization.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.NoActionTaken
member.summary: No actions were taken on any file, because all files were up to date, the synchronization was just a preview, or no master file could be selected due to conflicts. For a folder synchronization, this bit will only be set if all file synchronizations inside the folders take no action.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.NoMasterItemChosen
member.summary: A master among the items to synchronize could not be chosen, perhaps because all files were equal or because of possible conflicts between files. This bit can only be set when a file synchronization is performed.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.None
member.summary: No meaningful result.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.Preview
member.summary: For preview only.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.SomeActionsSuspended
member.summary: Actions were suspended on one or more of the files or folders to be synchronized.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.SomeItemsDeleted
member.summary: One or more items (files or folders) were deleted as part of the synchronization.

member.name: F:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult.SomeItemsFiltered
member.summary: One or more items (files or folders) were filtered out of the synchronization because of a object or because the item was null.

member.name: M:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.OnSynchronizeCompleted(System.Object,ComponentPro.ExtendedAsyncCompletedEventArgs{ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncResult})
member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: The sender object.
An that contains event data.

member.summary: Asynchronously synchronizes the specified items.
member.param: A value used to specify the index of the master item for the synchronization. The master item is the item that will be considered to be up to date and used to replace other items.
The search condition used to filter the specified synchronization items. Can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

An array of integers that contains indexes into the item list. These indexes identify items in the item list that should be considered irrelevant. An irrelevant item will still participate in the synchronization as normal. But it will be excluded from being selected as the master item.
A object representing the location where meta data, if enabled, can be accessed. Can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
A object representing the options to use during the synchronization process. Can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
A list of objects to be synchronized.
An optional asynchronous callback to be invoked when this operation completes. This parameter can be null.
A user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation.
member.returns: An object that references the asynchronous operation.

A object representing the options to use during the synchronization process. Can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

A user-provided object that identifies this particular asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.Synchronize(ComponentPro.IO.SearchCondition,ComponentPro.IO.FileInfoBase[])
member.summary: Synchronizes the specified items.
member.param: The search condition used to filter the specified synchronization items. Can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
A list of objects to be synchronized.
member.returns: A value that specifies one or more results from the synchronization. The value is a set of flags. When the bit is set, the synchronization was successful; otherwise, no files were synchronized, indicating some kind of failure.

member.name: M:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.Synchronize(ComponentPro.IO.SearchCondition,System.Int32,ComponentPro.IO.FileInfoBase[])
member.summary: Synchronizes the specified items, using the parameter as the index of master item in the list.
member.param: The search condition used to filter the specified synchronization items. Can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
A value used to specify the index of the master item for the synchronization. The master item is the item that will be considered to be up to date and used to replace other items.
A list of objects to be synchronized.
member.returns: A value that specifies one or more results from the synchronization. The value is a set of flags. When the bit is set, the synchronization was successful; otherwise, no files were synchronized, indicating some kind of failure.

member.name: M:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.Synchronize(ComponentPro.IO.SearchCondition,System.Object,ComponentPro.IO.FileInfoBase[])
member.summary: Synchronizes the specified items.
member.param: The search condition used to filter the specified synchronization items. Can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
A list of objects to be synchronized.
Opaque data that is sent back to the event handler when a synchronization event is raised.
member.returns: A value that specifies one or more results from the synchronization. The value is a set of flags. When the bit is set, the synchronization was successful; otherwise, no files were synchronized, indicating some kind of failure.

member.name: M:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.Synchronize(ComponentPro.IO.SearchCondition,System.Int32,System.Object,ComponentPro.IO.FileInfoBase[])
member.summary: Synchronizes the specified items.
member.param: The search condition used to filter the specified synchronization items. Can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
A list of objects to be synchronized.
A value used to specify the index of the master item for the synchronization. The master item is the item that will be considered to be up to date and used to replace other items.
Opaque data that is sent back to the event handler when a synchronization event is raised.
member.returns: A value that specifies one or more results from the synchronization. The value is a set of flags. When the bit is set, the synchronization was successful; otherwise, no files were synchronized, indicating some kind of failure.

member.name: M:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.Synchronize(System.Object,ComponentPro.IO.FileInfoBase,ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions,ComponentPro.IO.SearchCondition,ComponentPro.IO.FileInfoBase[])
member.summary: Synchronizes the specified items.
member.param: Opaque data that is sent back to the event handler when a synchronization event is raised.

A value used to specify the that is the master item for the synchronization. The master item is the item that will be considered to be up to date and used to replace other items. Can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
The search condition used to filter the specified synchronization items. Can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
A object representing the options to use during the synchronization process. Can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
A list of objects to be synchronized.
member.returns: A value that specifies one or more results from the synchronization. The value is a set of flags. When the bit is set, the synchronization was successful; otherwise, no files were synchronized, indicating some kind of failure.

member.name: M:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.Synchronize(ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.SyncOptions,System.Int32,ComponentPro.IO.FileInfoBase,System.Collections.IList,System.Collections.IList,ComponentPro.IO.SearchCondition,System.Object)
member.summary: Synchronizes the specified items.
member.param: Opaque data that is sent back to the event handler when a synchronization event is raised.
A value used to specify the index of the master item for the synchronization. The master item is the item that will be considered to be up to date and used to replace other items.
The search condition used to filter the specified synchronization items. Can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

An array of integers that contains indexes into the item list. These indexes identify items in the item list that should be considered irrelevant. An irrelevant item will still participate in the synchronization as normal. But it will be excluded from being selected as the master item.
A object representing the location where meta data, if enabled, can be accessed. Can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
A object representing the options to use during the synchronization process. Can be a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
A list of objects to be synchronized.
member.returns: A value that specifies one or more results from the synchronization. The value is a set of flags. When the bit is set, the synchronization was successful; otherwise, no files were synchronized, indicating some kind of failure.

member.name: M:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.ContainsFolder(System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Determines whether the synchronization is being performed on a folder.
member.param: An -implementing object representing the items being synchronized.
member.returns: true if the items being synchronized are a folder; false otherwise.

member.name: E:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.Analysis
member.summary: Occurs when the analysis is being performed.

member.name: E:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.CompareFileData
member.summary: Occurs when the file data is compared.

member.name: E:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.Conflict
member.summary: Occurs when there is a conflict.

member.name: E:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.FolderOperationAnalysis
member.summary: Occurs when the analysis is being performed.

member.name: E:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.FolderSynchronizationProgression
member.summary: Occurs every time a object, from a folder being synchronized, is about to be synchronized, providing, if enabled, progression information to the event handler.

member.name: E:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.GettingSynchronizationFileFromFolder
member.summary: Occurs when the synchronization file is being gotten from the folder.

member.name: E:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.LoadingMetaData
member.summary: Occurs when the meta data is being loaded.

member.name: E:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.MetaDataLoaded
member.summary: Occurs when the meta data has been loaded.

member.name: E:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.MetaDataSaved
member.summary: Occurs when the meta data has been saved.

member.name: E:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.SavingMetaData
member.summary: Occurs when the meta data is being saved.

member.name: E:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.Progress
member.summary: Occurs periodically during the synchronization of objects providing progression information to the event handler.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.InvokeFromCurrentThreads
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to raise events from the current thread or to use a object available when an asynchronous operation was started. The default value is false.
member.value: true to raise events directly from the current working thread; false to raise them using a object.
member.remarks: Synchronous methods always raise events from the current working thread.

member.name: E:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.SynchronizeCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when an asynchronous operation completes.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.TraceSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the source object for all log messages generated by this object. If not set, the property returns the current object.
member.remarks: It is handy to set this property to a different object other than this object in some situation where all log messages should come from a single source. For example, in a build system, uploading files is just a child task of a main one, by assigning this property to the main task, you can categorize all messages that come from the main task.

member.name: P:ComponentPro.IO.Synchronization.Synchronizer.TraceListenerManager
member.summary: Gets or sets the object to which the log messages generated by this object are sent. If not set, the trace listener manager is used. If this property is set to null, all messages from this object wont be logged.
